attributes.action: Stop all money leaving Great Britain in the form of foreign aid and charity until 100% of people in this country are above the poverty line.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A huge amount of money leaves this country every year to help those abroad, even though there are still people in Britain who are below the poverty line. It is time we put the needs of the poor in this country above the needs of the poor abroad. Stop all money leaving this country in aid and charity and use it to help our own people who need it.
